settings.inner_top_information_text: Customers are responsible for any import duties, custom fees, or local taxes that may apply to their purchase.
settings.inner_bottom_information_text: All of KALKI orders are shipped internationally from our warehouses across India to your provided shipping address via DHL/FEDEX. Due to the nature of international shipping, occasionally a customer may have to pay additional import duties and taxes. The large majority of orders will not have to pay any additional fees. However, we are unable to calculate when and how much these infrequent customs duty charges will be levied. In the case where additional customs charges are assessed, you will be responsible for paying these additional fees. To make your shopping experience as seamless as possible, we have arranged with DHL/FEDEX to customs clear your goods for you and deliver them to your doorstep. Payment is required prior to delivery, at the point when the shipment arrives at the customs checkpoint. Once the customs duties have been settled, the shipment is then released and promptly delivered to its destination.

settings.inner_information_text:
Liability – “In case of any damage to the product while in transit, the shipping partner shall be held liable for the same.”

KALKI offers domestic delivery within 3-4 days and international orders within 5-6 days from the date of purchase.

Razorpay Software Private Limited,
